for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    a=raw_input().split()
    x=list(a[0])
    y=list(a[1])
    #print x,y
    p=0
    count1=0
    for j in xrange(6):
        count=0
        p=0
        for k in range(j,j+5):
            if x[k]==y[p]:
                count+=1
                p+=1
        if count==5:
            print "1"
            break
        else:
            count1+=1
    if count1==6:
        print "0"
